languages.text: "Все, что он сообщил мне — что Теодора смогла добраться до миров, каких еще не видели люди Коронуса. И открыла там великий техноклад, к которому смог прикоснуться Амарнат".

"All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."
languages.original_text: "Все, что он сообщил мне — что Теодора смогла добраться до миров, каких еще не видели люди Коронуса. И открыла там великий техноклад, к которому смог прикоснуться Амарнат".

traits.locale_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege to touch upon."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「彼が私に伝えたことは、シオドーラはコロヌス・エクスパンスの人間が見たこともないような世界に辿り着いたということだ。そこで彼女は技術という素晴らしい宝物を発掘した。アマルナトはそれを経験する恩恵にあずかった」
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: 「彼が私に伝えたことは、シオドーラはコロヌス・エクスパンスの人間が見たこともないような世界に辿り着いたということだ。そこで彼女は技術という素晴らしい宝物を発掘した。アマルナトはそれを経験する恩恵にあずかった」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “他只告诉我，说西奥多拉抵达的世界，与科罗努斯扩区的人们所见过的所有世界都不一样。在那里，她发现了某个伟大的技术宝藏，而阿玛纳特有幸触碰过它。”
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: “他只告诉我，说西奥多拉抵达的世界，与科罗努斯扩区的人们所见过的所有世界都不一样。在那里，她发现了某个伟大的技术宝藏，而阿玛纳特有幸触碰过它。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Er hat mir nur übermittelt, dass Theodora Welten erreicht hat, wie die Menschen der Koronus-Ausdehnung sie noch nie gesehen hatten. Dort hat sie einen großen technologischen Schatz geborgen. Amarnat hatte das Privileg, ihn zu erleben."
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat mir nur übermittelt, dass Theodora Welten erreicht hat, wie die Menschen der Koronus-Ausdehnung sie noch nie gesehen hatten. Dort hat sie einen großen technologischen Schatz geborgen. Amarnat hatte das Privileg, ihn zu erleben."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Tout ce qu'il m'a dit, c'est que Théodora avait atteint des mondes inconnus des habitants des Étendues de Koronus et qu'elle y avait découvert un grand trésor de technologie qu'Amarnat avait eu la chance d'étudier. »
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce qu'il m'a dit, c'est que Théodora avait atteint des mondes inconnus des habitants des Étendues de Koronus et qu'elle y avait découvert un grand trésor de technologie qu'Amarnat avait eu la chance d'étudier. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Todo lo que me contó fue que Theodora había llegado a mundos que nadie en toda la Extensión de Koronus había visto jamás. En ellos encontró un gran tesoro tecnológico, uno que Amarnat tuvo el privilegio de experimentar».
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: «Todo lo que me contó fue que Theodora había llegado a mundos que nadie en toda la Extensión de Koronus había visto jamás. En ellos encontró un gran tesoro tecnológico, uno que Amarnat tuvo el privilegio de experimentar».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bana aktardığı tek şey şuydu: Theodora, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki insanların gördüğü dünyalara hiç benzemeyen yerlere ulaşmıştı. Burada muazzam bir hazine olan teknolojiler keşfetmişti, Amarnat da bunları deneyimleme ayrıcalığına nail olmuştu."
languages.original_text: "All that he conveyed to me was that Theodora had reached worlds unlike any the people of the Koronus Expanse had ever seen. There, she unearthed a great treasure of technology, one that Amarnat had the privilege of experiencing."

traits.locale_text: "Bana aktardığı tek şey şuydu: Theodora, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki insanların gördüğü dünyalarla uzaktan yakından alakası olmayan yerlere ulaşmıştı. Burada muazzam bir hazine olan teknolojiler keşfetmişti, Amarnat ise bunları deneyimleme ayrıcalığına nail olmuştu."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
